dict.acceptation: 设备，装备；器材，配件；（工作必需的）知识，素养；

sent.orig: Computer, duplicator, test equipment, lighting equipment, TV equipment, medical equipment, communication equipment and industrial automaticity, etc.
sent.trans: 计算机、复印机、测试设备、照明设备、电视设备、医疗设备、通讯设备、工业自动化等。

sent.orig: Statistical management: equipment ledger, equipment missing ledger, equipment scrapped ledger, equipment change (new) ledger, inventory exception.
sent.trans: 统计管理：设备总帐，设备丢失总帐，设备报废总帐，设备变动（新增）总帐，清查异常。

sent.orig: Refrigeration and Equipment, Machinery, Electrical Goods, Equipment and Supplies, Compressors and allied Equipment, Air-Conditioning and Equipment.
sent.trans: 采购产品制冷与设备，机械设备，电器用品，设备和用品，压缩机及专职设备，空气调节及设备。

sent.orig: China has advanced production equipment and improve the detection equipment and laboratory equipment.
sent.trans: 拥有国内先进的生产设备和完善的检测设备及实验设备。

sent.orig: Third, regular cleaning of all equipment and management of equipment rooms, that all equipment, facilities clean.
sent.trans: 定期清洁所有管理设备和设备房，确保所有设备、设施的整洁。
